name: Memory-game
tagline: This is a simple memory game in Unity3D
body:
# Memory-Game This is a simple memory game. The game will show different color schemes to different players and send data to a database in order to show that color will affect short term memory.
Project members
Andreas Stjerndal
MÃ¥ns Odstam
Luthon Hagvinprice
Yiming Fan

The game is implemented in Unity3d
To open the project, download unity from the above link and open the root folder of this repository.
The project proposal can be found here
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
